text: == Events == * In the Battle of Utica, the loyal Carthaginian troops of Hamilcar Barca defeat rebels. * Tiberius Sempronius Gracchus attacks Carthaginian rebels on the island of Sardinia, and he makes it into a Roman province. * The Parthian kingdom breaks away to become independent of the Seleucid Empire. Category:230s BC
title: 238 BC
